topics.title: Why Humans Eat on the Street

topics.title: Ancient Rome's Fast Food Joints

hook.text: Pompeii had over 150 thermopolia â€” ancient fast-food counters serving hot food to Roman citizens.

climax.text: Excavated thermopolia still have food residue â€” scientists identified pork, fish, snails, and grain from 79 AD.

topics.title: Street Food Safety: The Real Numbers

twist.text: The biggest risk isn't the food itself â€” it's contaminated water used for washing dishes and hands.
